basics.name: Rocky Huang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

highlights: Storage and organization of new datasets on the company's local server environment
Backup of datasets from our local server environment to our cloud environment
Running scripting to create video clips
Organizing video clips and editing video annotations using CVAT annotation tool
Creating and editing annotations in our annotation tool
Established unified visual identity on internal-facing web pages using HTML and CSS, aligning with the company's brand theme
Implemented responsive design principles, ensuring a consistent viewing experience across various devices and browsers
Actively engaged in the team's bi-weekly sprints
Consistently delivered on commitments, evidenced by a 100% completion rate of assigned Jira tickets, showcasing effective task management and adherence to project timelines
Collaborated in daily stand-up meetings, offering comprehensive progress reports in line with the Agile framework that streamlines communication
Contributed to sprint retrospectives, giving insights and suggestions for process improvement

volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
